Direzione o partecipazione a comitati ed.content: Reviewer per le seguenti riviste: Research Policy; Ecological Economics; Technological Forecasting and Social Change; Economics of Innovation and New Technology; Innovation, Management Policy and Practice; European Management Journal; Industry and Innovation; Journal of Cleaner Production; European Planning Studies; Environment and Planning C; Science and Public Policy; Papers in Regional Science; Journal of Engineering and Technology Management; Journal of Analytical and Institutional Economics – Economia Politica; Sustainability; Technological and Economic Development of the Economy
Membro dell'editorial board della collana di Working Paper SEEDS - Sustainability, Environmental Economics, Dynamics Studies http://www.sustainability-seeds.org/index.php/wp

Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: Institute of Innovation and Knowledge Management (INGENIO, CSIC-UPV) seminar, Valencia (Spain). Titolo della presentazione: Evaluating the additionality of a regional R&D support scheme. The case of the Emilia-Romagna region of Italy

European Association for Evolutionary Political Economy (EAEPE) 2011 Conference- Vienna (Austria). Titolo della presentazione: 1) The “potential” face of absorptive capacity. An empirical investigation for an area of 3 European countries; 2) Evaluating the additionality of a regional R&D support scheme. The case of the Emilia‐Romagna region of Italy.

2012 "The Governance of a Complex World" Conference, University of Nice (France). Titolo della presentazione: Industry-research cooperation within and across regional boundaries. What does innovation policy add?

Italian Association of Environmental and Resource Economists (IAERE) Conference, University of Ferrara (Italy). Titolo della presentazione: Does external knowledge affect environmental innovations? An empirical investigation on eleven European countries

8th European Meeting on Applied Evolutionary Economics (EMAEE), Sophia Antipolis (France). Titolo della presentazione: Does external knowledge affect environmental innovations? An empirical investigation on eleven European countries

34th Annual Conference of the Italian Association of Regional Science, University of Palermo (Italy). Titolo della presentazione: Does external knowledge affect environmental innovations? An empirical investigation on eleven European countries
54th Annual Conference of the Italian Economists Association, University of Bologna (Italy). Titolo della presentazione: Green investment strategies and export performance: a firm-level investigation

Italian Association of Environmental and Resource Economists (IAERE) Second Annual Conference, University of Milan (Italy). Titolo della presentazione: SMEs and barriers to eco-innovation. A proposed taxonomy
Membro del comitato scientifico del 2014 Eu-SPRI Forum Early Career Researcher Conference, Institute of Innovation and Knowledge Management (INGENIO, CSIC-UPV), Valencia (Spain)

DRUID Society Conference 2014, Copenhagen Business School (Denmark). Titolo della presentazione: Exploring and yet failing less: the role of exploitation and human capital to foster learning from exploration
Eu-SPRI 2014 Conference, University of Manchester (UK). Titolo della presentazione: Shared pain is half the pain? Overcoming barriers to innovation through cooperation
Druid Society Conference 2015, Luiss University Rome (Italy). Titolo della presentazione: Do green jobs differ from non-green jobs in terms of skills and human capital?
SEEDS Seminar Series, University of Ferrara (Italy). Titolo della presentazione: Exploring and yet failing less. The role of current and past exploration in R&D
Copernicus Institute of Sustainable Development Seminar Series, University of Utrecht (NL). Titolo della presentazione: Exploring and yet failing less. The role of current and past exploration in R&D

Eurkind – Governance of a Complex World Conference “Innovation, Employment and the Environment”, Institute of Innovation and Knowledge Management (INGENIO, CSCI-UPV), Valencia (Spain). Titolo della presentazione: Better late than never’: a longitudinal quantile regression approach to the interplay between green technology and age for firm growth

SPRU 50th Anniversary Conference, University of Sussex (UK). Titolo della presentazione: Better late than never’: a longitudinal quantile regression approach to the interplay between green technology and age for firm growth

Wednesday Seminar Series, SPRU (Science Policy Research Unit), University of Sussex (UK). Titolo della presentazione: ‘Better late than never’: a longitudinal quantile regression approach to the interplay between green technology and age for firm growth

Responsabilita' di studi e ricerche scie.content: Incarico per la redazione di un rapporto contenente le linee guida per amministratori locali in termini di politiche locali per l’innovazione. Svolto per Dipartimento di Economia - Universita' di Trento
Assegno di ricerca presso Dipartimento di Economia Internazionale, delle Istituzioni e dello Sviluppo (DISEIS), Universita' Cattolica del Sacro Cuore di Milano
Incarico per la Costruzione dataset di brevetti verdi (CO2 abatement) Europei, settoriali e macroeconomici. Svolto per Dipartimento di Economia e Management - Universita' di Ferrara.

Conseguimento di premi e riconoscimenti.content: Eu-SPRI Forum PhD Circulation Award per un periodo di visiting presso Institute of Innovation and Knowledge Management (INGENIO) - Spanish National Research Council (CSIC) Polytechnic University of Valencia (UPV), Valencia (Spagna)

Premio Marco Fanno (Dept of Economics and Management, University of Padua) per il paper: Antonietti, R. and Marzucchi, A. (2014), Green tangible investment strategies and export performance: A firm-level investigation, Ecological Economics, 108,150–161

Specifiche esperienze professionali cara.content: PhD (European Doctorate) in Local Development and Global Dynamics (Major in Innovation and Local Development). Dissertation in: "Evaluating the Additionality of Innovation Policy. An Investigation at Different Levels of Analysis". School of Social Sciences, University of Trento (IT)

Direzione o partecipazione alle attivit\.content: Partecipazione al progetto "Public policies and local development: innovation policy and its effects on locally embedded global dynamics". Ente finanziatore: Provincia Autonoma di Trento (Italia). Schema di finanziamento: Grandi Progetti PAT. Ruolo: ricercatore

Partecipazione al progetto "Climate changes in the Mediterranean area: evolutionary scenarios, mitigation policies and technological innovation". Ente finanziatore: Ministero dell'Istruzione dell'Universita' e della Ricerca (MIUR). Schema di Finanziamento: PRIN. Ruolo: ricercatore
Partecipazione al progetto: "La valutazione economica dei disastri naturali in Italia". Ente finanziatore: Fondazione Generali. Ruolo: ricercatore

Partecipazione al progetto: "European Global Transition Network on Eco-Innovation, Green Economy and Sustainable Development". Ente finanziatore: European Commission. Schema del finanziamento: Horizon 2020. Ruolo: ricercatore
Partecipazione al progetto: "European Topic Centre on Waste and Materials in a Green Economy". Ente finanziatore: European Environment Agency. Ruolo: ricercatore

Partecipazione al progetto: "Technical Change, Employment and Inequality: A Spatial analysis of households & plant data (TEMPIS)". Ente finanziatore: English Social Research Council. Schema di Finanziamento: ESRC Secondary Data Analysis Initiative. Ruolo: Co-Investigator

Formale attribuzione di incarichi di ins.content: Research associate (Doctor vinculado), Institute of Innovation and Knowledge Management (INGENIO) - Spanish National Research Council (CSIC) Polytechnic University of Valencia (UPV), Valencia (Spagna)
Research Fellow in Economics of Innovation, SPRU Science Policy Research Unit - School of Business, Management and Economics, University of Sussex (UK)

Lecturer in Economics of Innovation, SPRU Science Policy Research Unit - School of Business Management and Economics, University of Sussex (UK). Permanent position. (A.A. 2016-2017. Autumn term: Managing Innovation - Seminars Tutor; Spring term: Economics of Innovation - Convenor)
